sentences.sContent: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.sCn: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.sContent: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.sCn: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

phrases.pCn: 为了某人；代表...一方；为了某人的利益

remMethod.val: be + half(半) → 变成两半， 一变二， 当然生利 → 利益

trans.tranOther: instead of someone, or as their representative
